title: Midnight Rainbow
description: Passion and espionage meet in this fan-favorite tale from New York Times bestselling author Linda HowardGrant Sullivan is the best agent the US government has ever had, and he has one rescue the wealthy socialite Jane Hamilton Greer from captivity. But is Jane just a society girl in over her head, or is she really engaged in espionage that could compromise US interests for years to come? Only one thing is when Grant finds Jane, questions of guilt and innocence begin to fade against the undeniable attraction between this fiery coupleâ€¦
author: Linda Howard
